author: cnbc.com
title: Graña y Montero S.A.A. to Host Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call
text:
LIMA, Peru--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Grupo Graña y Montero S.A.A. (NYSE:GRAM) (BVL:GRAMONC1) cordially invites you to participate in its Fourth Quarter 2017 Conference Call.
Thursday, February 01, 2018
12:00p.m. New York Time
12:00p.m. Lima Time
Presenting for Grupo Graña y Montero:
Luis Diaz Olivero - Chief Executive Officer Mónica Miloslavich Hart – Chief Financial Officer To access the call, please dial: 1-866-267-4494 from within the U.S. 1-412-380-2002 from outside the U.S. Please ask to join Graña y Montero Call
There will be a simultaneous webcast presentation to accompany these results available at: https://www.webcaster4.com/Webcast/Page/1116/24324
Grupo Graña y Montero will report its Fourth Quarter 2017 Consolidated Earnings on Wednesday, January 31, 2018, after the market closes. The report will also be available at: http://investorrelations.granaymontero.com.pe/
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180131006494/en/
Graña y Montero S.A.A.
Mónica Miloslavich Hart, 511-213-6565
